subject: PGA Championship
Golf
lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods was in a three-way for first, with Carl Pettersson and his old rival Vijay Singh, after a one-under 71 on a blustery day at the P.G.A. Championship.
snippet: Tiger Woods was in a three-way for first, with Carl Pettersson and his old rival Vijay Singh, after a one-under 71 on a blustery day at the P.G.A. Championship.
